name: Jason Wu
introduction: I've worked in many different places, from medium sized companies with a start-up feel, to large international corporations. As a jack of all trades, I've worked on a wild variety of projects, from creating new in-house tools, to migrating old customers onto a new system, to maintaining and expanding enterprise solutions. I have recently returned from a two and half month trip of Europe with my girlfriend and I'm looking for opportunities to expand my horizons. As an avid gamer, I enjoy playing all genre of games, from RTSs to RPGs to even board games. I like to balance out my activities by exploring the numerous trails around Metro Vancouver.
introduction2: I am a full stack software devloper. I help expand and improve existing products. When I'm not hiking with my girlfriend on the trails of the BC interior, you can find me playing all sorts of video games. From RTSs to RPGs. At the end of Feburary this year, I went on a trip of a lifetime with my girlfriend to Western Europe, we explored over 15 different european cities, ranging from London, UK to Lisbon, Portugual to Prague in the Czech Republic. Have an exciting job oppertunity that you want to me about? I'd love to hear from you

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computing Science
